title: Robert Gilmour (footballer)
text:
H. Robert Gilmour was a Scottish amateur <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="inside%20forward">inside forward</a> who played in the <a href="Scottish%20Football%20League">Scottish League</a> for <a href="Queen%27s%20Park%20F.C.">Queen's Park</a> and <a href="Falkirk%20F.C.">Falkirk</a>.
Personal life.
Gilmour served as a <a href="second%20lieutenant">second lieutenant</a> in the <a href="Royal%20Garrison%20Artillery">Royal Garrison Artillery</a> during the <a href="First%20World%20War">First World War</a>.
